> **注意**: このページはまだ日本語に翻訳されていません。以下は英語の原文です。

```ts
function encryptKeystoreJsonSync(
   account, 
   password, 
   options?): string
```

Return the JSON Keystore Wallet for `account` encrypted with `password`.

The `options` can be used to tune the password-based key derivation function parameters, explicitly set the random
values used. Any provided [**ProgressCallback**](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/ProgressCallback) is ignored.

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `account` | [`KeystoreAccount`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/KeystoreAccount) | The account to encrypt. |
| `password` | `string` \| `Uint8Array` | The password to encrypt the JSON data. |
| `options`? | [`EncryptOptions`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/EncryptOptions) | The options to use when encrypting the JSON data. |

## Returns

`string`

The encrypted JSON data.
